name: reactstrap-date-picker
description: Reactstrap based, zero dependencies, date picker
author: Donato Lorenzo <donato@afialapis.com>

scripts.clean-demo: rm -rf demo/dist && mkdir -p demo/dist/img && ln -s ./logo/favicon/reactstrap-date-picker.ico demo/dist/img/
scripts.clean-all: npm run --silent clean-demo && npm run --silent clean-lib && npm run --silent clean-dist && npm run --silent clean-site
scripts.lib: npm run --silent clean-lib && npx xeira transpile
scripts.dist: npm run --silent clean-dist && npx xeira bundle
scripts.site: npm run --silent clean-site && npx xeira site
scripts.prepare: npm run --silent clean-demo && npm run --silent lint && npm run --silent test && npm run --silent lib && npm run --silent dist && npm run --silent site
scripts.demo: npm run --silent clean-demo && npx xeira demo --port=8003
scripts.reset: npm run --silent clean-all && rm -fr node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
